respStmt.resp: Original EpiDoc Encoding for Siddham, following published edition unless otherwise noted in comments

licence.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit thttps://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_V01.xmlfile.

revisionDesc.change: Additional global changes for compatibility with DHARMA
Updating toward the encoding template v03

Initial import: harmonising file structure with DHARMA inscription template v02. Text and comments as inherited from the Siddham archive of January 2019, unless otherwise indicated (by a name and date in the comment). Comments are offered "as is" and do not represent a thoroughly considered or researched opinion.

div.p:
sa kailāsa-kūṭa-bha
vanād bhagavat-paśupati-bhaṭṭāraka-pādānugr̥hīto bappa-pādānudhyātaḥ śrī-jiṣṇuguptaḥ
kuśalī thambū-gāṅśul-mūlavāṭikā-grāmeṣu nivāsam upagatān kuṭumbinaḥ kuśala
m ābhāṣya samājñāpayati viditam astu bhavatām bhaṭṭāraka-mahārājādhirāja-śry-aṁśu
varma-pādair yuṣmadīya-grāmāṇām upakārāya yo ’sau tilamaka Ānīto ’bhūt pra
tisaṁskārābhāvād vinaṣṭam udvīkṣya sāmanta-candravarma-vijñaptair asmābhis tasyai
va prasādī-kr̥tas tena cāsmad-anujñātena yuṣmad-grāmāṇām evopakārāya pra
tisaṁskr̥to ’sya copakārasya pāramparyāvicchedena ciratara-kālodvahanā
ya yuṣmākaṁ vāṭikā Api prasādī-kr̥tās tad etābhyo yathā-kālam piṇḍa
kam upasamhr̥tya bhavadbhir eva tilamaka-pratisaṁskāraḥ karaṇīya Etad-grāma-
traya-vyatirekeṇa cānya-grāma-nivāsinān na keṣāñcin netuṁ labhyate ’sya ca
prasādasya cira-sthitaye śilā-paṭṭaka-śāsanam idan dattam evaṁ-vedibhir na
kaiścid ayam prasādo ’nyathā karaṇīyo yas tv etām ājñām atikramyānyathā tilama
kan nayet tasyāvaśyan daṇḍaḥ pātayitavyo bhaviṣyadbhir api bhūpatibhiḥ pūrva-rā
ja-kr̥ta-prasādānuvartibhir eva bhavitavyam iti Api cātra vāṭikānām uddeśa ḥ
tham bū-grāmasya dakṣiṇoddeśe pūrveṇārāmaṁ vim mā 2 tilamakasya paścima-pradeśe mā
deva-kulaṁ pūrveṇa mā 4 mūlavāṭikā-grāmasyottarataḥ Aśiṅko-pradeśe mā 8
pradeśe mā 1 gāṅśul-grāmaṁ paścimena kaḍampriṅ-pradeśe mā 4 kaṅkulaṁ-pradeśe
mā 4 svayam ājñā saṁvaT
40 8 kārtika-śukla 2 dūtako yuvarāja-śrī-viṣṇuguptaḥ
